Assessment.QuestionText: Which of the following statements of <font face="courier new">DataAdapter</font> classes are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: The <font face="courier new">DataAdapter</font> is used to link the <font face="courier new">DataSet</font> to a data source.
The <font face="courier new">SqlDataAdapter</font> is used to edit data in the SQL Server database and update the <font face="courier new">DataSet</font>.
The <font face="courier new">OleDbDataAdapter</font> class is used to connect to multiple databases such as SQL, Oracle, and Microsoft Access.
The <font face="courier new">AcceptChangesDuringFill</font> property indicates how the <font face="courier new">DataReader</font> object is used to fill the <font face="courier new">DataSet</font>.

The <font face="courier new">Fill()</font> method uses the <font face="courier new">DataSet</font> name to add or refresh rows in the <font face="courier new">DataSet</font> to match with those in the data source.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(True), (B)-(False), (C)-(True), (D)-(False), and (E)-(True).
